name: Unseen Servant
description: You create an invisible, mindless force in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. The servant has AC 10, 1 hit point, Strength 2, and it can't attack. If it drops to 0 HP, the spell ends. On each of your turns, you can use a Bonus Action to command it to move up to 15 feet and perform a simple task (fetch, clean, mend, open/close, fold, light/extinguish). It can carry up to 10 pounds and stops moving if ordered beyond 60 feet.

components.materialDescription: a piece of string and a bit of wood

effects.description: Summons an invisible servant (AC 10, 1 HP, Str 2) that obeys simple commands, moves 15 feet per command, and performs basic tasks but cannot attack; ends if reduced to 0 HP.
